code: @Manual{,   title = {LGPclassifiers: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort},   author = {Clara Amorosi and Manuel {Ugidos Guerrero} and Matt Stokes},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort
text: package contains -house implemented classifiers LGP project. moment includes Reddy Cell Origin classifier (original implementation published single-sample implemented version).

title: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort
text: can install latest released version LGPclassifiers like : can install dev version:

title: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort
text: basic example shows generate Reddy COO classifications matrix samples first normalizing sample tpm counts, calculating sample COO classifications comparing normalized reference
code: library(LGPclassifiers)  # Get example query matrix # rna.counts <- readRDS("/stash/results/dev/kyriakoc/DLBCL/forManuel/rna.counts.rds") query <- rna.counts$NDMER # Normalize to TPMs query.tpm <- apply(query,2,function(x) {   1000000*x/sum(x, na.rm = TRUE) })  # Run Reddy COO classifier on reference-normalized samples subType <- computeCOO(query = query.tpm, useReference = T)  # Run Reddy COO classifier, provide a different reference subType2 <- computeCOO(query = query.tpm, useReference = T, reference = reference.tpm)  # Run original implementation of Reddy COO classifier subType3 <- computeCOO(query = query.tpm, useReference = F)

what: LGPclassifiers: Classifiers for the LGP Cohort — LGPclassifiers-package

what: Classify Sample Cell Of Origin — computeCOO
title: Classify Sample Cell Of Origin — computeCOO
text: Classify matrix RNAseq sample counts Cell Origin, either original Reddy implementation reference-based single sample classification

title: Classify Sample Cell Of Origin — computeCOO
code: computeCOO(   query,   useReference = TRUE,   reference = NULL,   id2geneName = NULL,   collapse = TRUE,   featureType = "gene",   ... )

title: Classify Sample Cell Of Origin — computeCOO
text: query Matrix input samples (values must TPM, one row per transcript/gene id) useReference Whether use external reference perform single sample classification. (default T) reference Optional matrix reference input samples (values must TPM, one row per transcript/gene id). specified, default Robust reference dataset. id2geneName data frame mapping Ensembl gene ids/transcript ids gene names (provided internal package data) collapse T/F whether collapse transcripts gene level (default T) featureType either "gene" "transcript" (default "gene") ... parameters ss.normalize

title: Classify Sample Cell Of Origin — computeCOO
code: if (FALSE) { # Classify query samples relative to reference dataset subType <- computeCOO(query = queryMatrix, useReference = T) }

what: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
title: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
text: Normalize tpm sample counts based housekeeping gene levels

title: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
code: ss.normalize(   tpm.mat,   id2geneName = NULL,   collapse = TRUE,   featureType = "gene",   houseKeeping = c("ISY1", "R3HDM1", "TRIM56", "UBXN4", "WDR55"),   ref.mean = NULL,   ref.sd = NULL )

title: Normalize sample based on housekeeping genes — ss.normalize
text: tpm.mat matrix input samples (values must TPM, one row per transcript/gene id) id2geneName data frame mapping Ensembl gene ids/transcript ids gene names (provided internal package data) collapse T/F whether collapse transcripts gene level (default T) featureType either "gene" "transcript" (default "gene") houseKeeping vector housekeeping genes normalize (ISY1, R3HDM1, TRIM56, UBXN4, WDR55) ref.mean, ref.sd reference gene means standard deviations
